trans-unit.source: Controls the layout of an object when exported to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 控制匯出至 Unmanaged 程式碼時的物件配置。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime uses the `Auto` layout value by default.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 使用`Auto`預設版面配置值。

trans-unit.source: To reduce layout-related problems associated with the `Auto` value, C#, Visual Basic, and C++ compilers specify `Sequential` layout for value types.
trans-unit.target: 若要減少與相關聯的配置相關問題`Auto`值，指定 C#、 Visual Basic 和 c + + 編譯器`Sequential`配置的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack?displayProperty=nameWithType> field controls the alignment of data fields, and thus affects the layout regardless of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind> value you specify.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack?displayProperty=nameWithType>欄位控制資料欄位的對齊方式，因此會影響不論配置<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind>您指定的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack> is 0, which indicates the default packing size for the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，值<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack>為 0，指出預設的封裝大小目前平台。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use the `Explicit` layout value and specify field alignments on byte boundaries, you must set <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack> to 1 to get the desired result.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您使用`Explicit`配置值，並指定欄位對齊，位元組界限上，您必須設定<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack>為 1，以取得所要的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the managed declaration of the `PtInRect` function, which checks whether a point lies within a rectangle, and defines a `Point` structure with Sequential layout and a `Rect` structure with Explicit layout.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的受管理的宣告`PtInRect`函式，以檢查點是否位於在矩形中，並定義`Point`具有循序配置的結構和`Rect`具有明確配置的結構。

trans-unit.source: The runtime automatically chooses an appropriate layout for the members of an object in unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段會自動選擇 Unmanaged 記憶體中物件成員的適當配置。

trans-unit.source: Objects defined with this enumeration member cannot be exposed outside of managed code.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉成員定義的物件不可以在 Managed 程式碼以外公開。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to do so generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試這麼做會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The precise position of each member of an object in unmanaged memory is explicitly controlled, subject to the setting of the <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack" /> field.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 記憶體中每個物件成員的精確位置是被明確地控制（受制於<see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack" />欄位的設定）。

trans-unit.source: Each member must use the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FieldOffsetAttribute" /> to indicate the position of that field within the type.
trans-unit.target: 每個成員必須使用 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FieldOffsetAttribute" />，表示該欄位在型別中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The members of the object are laid out sequentially, in the order in which they appear when exported to unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: 物件的成員是依序配置的，其順序即是將它們匯出至 Unmanaged 記憶體時所出現的順序。

trans-unit.source: The members are laid out according to the packing specified in <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack" />, and can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: 成員是根據 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute.Pack" /> 中所指定的封裝來配置。
